contents:
946 Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson issued the order for an administrative stay, approving Trump's emergency appeal to withhold full funding of SNAP food aid payments amid a shutdown. posted 5 days ago by hocuspocusfocusjeep 108 comments award share download report block
108 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save TooTrue-translation 95 points 5 days ago Remember how she thought the dude was talking about Abraham Lincoln yesterday? Peperidge Farm remembers! permalink award report block reply lefty295 67 points 5 days ago She didn’t make this decision. She is assigned the 1st circuit. All requests go though her, but she HAS TO refer them to the full court, who all vote on a stay like this. She likely voted against this stay, but she can’t make this decision on her own. permalink parent award report block reply DrVSGGEOTUSPhD 45 points 5 days ago Writing this Must have been....most unpleasant for her Edit i meant because she wants to be giving out free stuff not because writing is hard permalink parent award report block reply AussieTrumpFan 18 points 5 days ago Could be AI.  Has anyone checked for em-dash appearance? permalink parent award report block reply TooStoopid 8 points 5 days ago Wait, is the use of the em-dash an Ai sign? If so,
... Dammit, I loved using it, it was that kinda fun secret no one rly uses. permalink parent award report block reply view 11 more comments... Retarded D voters will never even know Jumanji let Trump cut off their SNAP. This shit is so obvious by now. The Rs will lose the midterms because R voters wont be supporting israel's stooges anymore and Ds get to rile up their base by starving them a bit while blaming Rs. The Rs will help starve and motivate D voters. The Rs and Ds are working together to make this a reality. Trump is just being led around by his massive ego by the Rs. permalink parent award report block reply JerryNadlerBeltFund 1 points 4 days ago But, also because writing is hard. permalink parent award report block reply doodaddy 1 points 4 days ago good point!  but we're way past communists abiding by any rules, absolute rules or not, on the federal stage or not. permalink parent award report block reply Bearing51 22 points 5 days ago Want to bet she doesn't remember though? permalink parent award report block reply Konsaki 29 points 5 days ago She doesn't understand. permalink parent award report block reply Bearing51 20 points 5 days ago But I did eat breakfast. permalink parent award report block reply congruent 7 points 5 days ago I know that one :) permalink parent award report block reply tree_sloth4 7 points 5 days ago chirp permalink parent award report block reply MasterChief08 6 points 5 days ago She can't even spell Abraham by hand. permalink parent award report block reply Agenda47 4 points 5 days ago It's ok, ChatGPT spells it for her. permalink parent award report block reply NomadicKrow2 2 points 5 days ago Woah woah woah. Maybe her clerks are tired of being laughed at, but I suspect the Dems want SNAP suspended for their narrative. permalink parent award report block reply fskfsk 15 points 5 days ago Most likely this.  Even for a competent judge, most of the work is done by the clerks. permalink parent award report block reply moscowjade 5 points 5 days ago As a county clerk, can confirm. permalink parent award report block reply Zelda 1 points 5 days ago Are you bombarded with the county clerk video from TikTok? Because that’s totally my county clerk . permalink parent award report block reply NomadicKrow2 5 points 5 days ago Resume: "Worked as legal clerk for Ketanji Brown Jackson." Resume goes in garbage. permalink parent award report block reply IncredibleMrE1 4 points 5 days ago This is it. permalink parent award report block reply fightfightfightx 1 points 5 days ago yes, its all narrative Trump needs to go all in, or not. This half assed approach is just making ppl mad but for no real benefit. permalink parent award report block reply lefty295 1 points 5 days ago She didn’t make this decision. She is assigned the 2nd circuit. So it’s under her name. But the the full SOCTUS votes on stays like this. Edit: she’s assigned the 1st circuit, which Rhode Island is under, I put the wrong one. permalink parent award report block reply SalteenCracker 2 points 5 days ago Thank you, kind sir. permalink parent award report block reply AllisterTwo 1 points 4 days ago Only in rare instances does the full court vote on emergency stays initially, it's almost always the purview of the single justice  assigned to the circuit...  There is nothing that suggest or indicates the full court voted on this one... Even Left Wing propaganda sites like Politico agree... https://www.politico.com/news/2025/11/07/ketanji-brown-jackson-supreme-court-snap-benefits-ruling-00643639 The administration’s emergency appeal was routed to Jackson because she is assigned to oversee urgent matters arising from the 1st Circuit. She will likely refer the issue to the full court at some juncture, but her order Friday gave no indication she has yet done so. permalink parent award report block reply load 1 more comments... yukondave 2 points 5 days ago No she is a commie.  She wants to give the next COmmie leader the power to control food permalink parent award report block reply aaafirefly123 2 points 5 days ago That’s basically what that lower court was doing, And I get the feeling that the SCOTUS is gonna put that lower court in its place VERY soon. It’s one thing to rule in a way that hinders a perfectly legal and constitutional action, but to ACTIVELY try to FORCE the executive branch to violate the constitution… that’s something that is unprecedented. permalink parent award report block reply snoopy3210 1 points 4 days ago It was a trap. Trump’s lawyers, probably on the order of Todd Blanche, want him to lose the midterms with this. Todd Blanche is s crook who brought a fake top secret war plan to Mar a lago in 2021 and illegally recorded the President! permalink parent award report block reply MAGA_NRG 31 points 5 days ago Did I read that right? permalink award report block reply TrumpAndGodWin 34 points 5 days ago Her masters told her to starve the SNAPricans to kick off their race based civil war while they're trying to crash the stock market and bring in dystopian technocratic neo feudalism? permalink parent award report block reply MasterChief08 28 points 5 days ago The economy is doing rather well for such a massive government shutdown. It's almost as if 70% of the federal government is a waste  and I'm being incredibly generous with that number. permalink parent award report block reply goldkeyboardwarrior 8 points 5 days ago Unless you’re a federal employee or in the military the shutdown for the most part wasn’t going to affect your average person for the first few weeks. But Dems know that the best way to try and hurt Trump is to affect air travel which is why they’re resisting passing a stand-alone bill paying feds since that would keep TSA and air traffic controllers from calling out en masse. permalink parent award report block reply Agenda47 8 points 5 days ago SNAPricans, proud descendants of the legendary Basketball Americans. permalink parent award report block reply Emodius 6 points 5 days ago Lmao at SNAPricans. So wrong permalink parent award report block reply TrumpAndGodWin 4 points 5 days ago Kek i almost said snaprican Americans but I wanted to include white leftists, Mexicans, etc and fairly spread the blame. permalink parent award report block reply MAGA_NRG 5 points 5 days ago This is food for thought. Makes sense. Ok thanks for the clarification. permalink parent award report block reply Ch3f4554551n 5 points 5 days ago A race-based civil war would be over in days and would favor MAGA. The stock market is due for a massive retrace, and policy won't stop it. permalink parent award report block reply TrumpAndGodWin 3 points 5 days ago It's not the blacks or leftist useful idiots you'd have to worry about in a civil war with the globalists that let in hundreds of thousands of Chinese military,  middle eastern terrorists like Hezbollah, etc and their biological weapons, cyberattacks, etc. permalink parent award report block reply Ch3f4554551n 1 points 5 days ago Oh no! Cyberattacks! Lol where are the Chinese going to land and get slaughtered? Long Beach or Mussel Shoals? permalink parent award report block reply view 3 more comments... lefty295 6 points 5 days ago No, she is assigned the 1st circuit, Rhode Island falls under that. The request goes to her, she has to refer it to the full court, and they all vote on stays like this. She likely voted against it. She didn’t make this decision. permalink parent award report block reply killedmytv 19 points 5 days ago The only reason Jumanji (or whoever wrote her homework assignment for her) did this is because she thinks it'll hurt Trump among the welfare class and useful idiots who get all their news from the TV. There's no way she did this because it was the right decision. permalink award report block reply MasterChief08 8 points 5 days ago The welfare class overwhelmingly votes Democrat regardless.  And the ones who don't are typically truly disabled Americans who know this shutdown is 100% on Democrats. permalink parent award report block reply lefty295 5 points 5 days ago She didn’t do this. You’re all wrong about this. She is assigned the 1st circuit. Rhode Island where the district court is, falls under that. She MUST refer all requests to the full SCOTUS, who then vote on the stay. She doesn’t decide this on her own. She has to bring it to the full court. permalink parent award report block reply goldkeyboardwarrior 3 points 5 days ago There are some Dems on social media demanding to know why she did it so that will be interesting. permalink parent award report block reply lefty295 4 points 5 days ago She didn’t, they just don’t understand how stays with SCOTUS work. permalink parent award report block reply zooty 4 points 5 days ago They don't understand much, to be honest. permalink parent award report block reply SanityGumby 2 points 5 days ago That and I suspect it's bad for the supreme court to let a lower court have that much power. She wants that power. permalink parent award report block reply lefty295 15 points 5 days ago That’s not how it works. That’s not her decision. She issues it because she was assigned that circuit. The request goes to her, she MUST refer it to the full court, and they all vote on it. This is not Jackson deciding it should be stayed. This the full SCOTUS voting for a stay, and it’s in her assigned circuit. permalink award report block reply ForceMultiplier 1 points 4 days ago I sure wish that u/hocuspocusfocusjeep would spend 30 seconds to drop the url we all know he has, so I could explore the context. permalink parent award report block reply we_won_the_war_jack 10 points 5 days ago It’s a play then.  They want this. permalink award report block reply JohnN 7 points 5 days ago The Marxists do this with hopeless cases to appear to be "measured and thoughtful." permalink award report block reply DJT_MFers1 6 points 5 days ago With a name like Ketanji it’s only matter of time that she commits robbery homicide permalink award report block reply YodaBannon 5 points 5 days ago show them all the beauty they possess inside. The funds were allocated by Congress for an "emergency", and the democrats stonewalling is not an emergency, it's just idiocy. permalink award report block reply Easzq8 3 points 5 days ago I’m speaking, I’m speaking! permalink award report block reply asiatrails 3 points 5 days ago She probably had it ghostwritten by AI and signed by the indefatigable clerk Otto Pen.
